97f74fe8-64c8-427c-b13c-f59f4e1ad694:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"97f74fe8-64c8-427c-b13c-f59f4e1ad694","title":{"en":"The Thief Akikazu Inoue"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Hi no Yama"},{"ja":"火の山"},{"en":"Fire Mountain"},{"en":"The Thief Inoue Akikazu"},{"en":"Mountain of Fire"},{"it":"La montagna di fuoco"}],"lastChapter":"5","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"Seinen (and one Josei) One-shot compilation focusing on insincerity, revenge, and the two-faced nature of men. \n\nIncludes the following:\n\n- **The Record of Peter Kürten** (ペーター・キュルテンの記録, Peter Kürten no Kiroku, ALT. ENG. - The Tale of Peter Kürten) - Manga biography on the infamous serial killer also known by the moniker *\"The Vampire of Düsseldorf\"*. Peter Kürten, a former prisoner-of-war, forms an idealistic couple with his wife and is a devoted unionist at meetings. In actuality he is a sexually perverted serial killer nicknamed the Vampire of Düsseldorf who taunts the police with escalating murders. After one of the murders, the police force a fake confession from another man, causing Peter to angrily reveal the truth to his wife, who gives him up to the police. At trial it is revealed that Peter is actually a criminal with a history of incest, bestiality, arson, and murder. When his lawyer tries to defend him by claiming madness, Peter angrily exclaims that his actions are revenge against the bourgeois. Peter is executed by guillotine. (Tezuka based the story on the work of Shunsuke Tsurumi)\n\n- **Sensual Nights** (もの憂げな夜, Monouge na Yoru) - A wealthy Japanese playboy visits Vietnam to seduce a woman who has supposedly stopped aging while waiting for her sweetheart who was taken away by soldiers. As he is in the middle of preparing to have sex with her, his contact tells him that the woman's man was taken away by the Japanese army during the Pacific War, causing a deep hatred of Japanese people in her. He panics, but recovers when the woman reacts by offering him her body. When she fights back against his attempts at intimacy, he tells her that her lover is likely dead and forces himself on her. The man then sees a sight of a wrinkled old woman that startles him so much he jumps out of the window. The woman he had seduced was actually the daughter of the unaging woman and her sweetheart, and his contact was her fiancé.\n\n- **Lord Iechika Mogami** (最上殿始末, Mogami-dono Shimatsu) - Piipii, a meager farmer, dreams of being a samurai so he can support his wife and their four children. One day he is employed by a lord to be his double, and Piipii's family is secretly killed. Piipii trains to be a lord, grooming and dressing himself to be the spitting image of the lord. As a test, the lord tells him to give the order to open the castle gates. Piipii rides back to visit his family, only to learn about their deaths. On the lord's wedding day, his double is supposed to replace him during the wedding ceremony to protect him from any attempts on his life. During the switch, Piipii murders the lord and consummates the marriage with the lady Sasa instead. When she learns of his identity, the lady has an affair with a syphilitic beggar, and kills herself. The disease spreads to Piipii and Sasa gets her revenge.\n\n- **The Lady of the Rhine** (ラインの館にて, Rhine no Yakata nite) - A Japanese woman accompanies her husband on a business trip to Düsseldorf. She catches him having an affair, and when she confronts him, he leaves her. As she desperately searches for him in the streets, the woman is hit by a car and is hospitalized for a month. When she recovers, she visits her benefactor Lady Rathwood, the owner of a castle they had visited earlier. As she lives with Lady Rathwood, the woman learns of her hatred for men and her hatred for her husband is kindled. One day she discovers that the car she was hit with belongs to Lady Rathwood and she witnesses Lady Rathwood taking off the disguise of the woman who seduced her husband. Lady Rathwood calls her husband to the castle and gives the woman a knife, telling her to take her revenge. The woman refuses and goes back to her husband.\n\n- **Fire Mountain** (火の山, Hi no Yama, ALT. ENG. - The Thief Akikazu Inoue) - Time is during the Second World War. The ruffian Akikazu Inoue (whose first name could also be read as Showa) went to the Sobetsu village in Hokkaido, became an assistant of Mr. Masao Mimatsu, an observer of Showa Shinzan, which rapidly generated. The description that Mikami lived for the observation and protection of Showa Shinzan was based on a true story.\n\n---\n**Volume 265 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**"},"links":{"al":"52250","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B00JPXEQOY","ap":"the-thief-akikazu-inoue","bw":"de3c09c9b3-c299-4c41-a15d-a9ec798f839e","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/100402/","kt":"hi-no-yama","mal":"22250","mu":"48838"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"33771934-028e-4cb3-8744-691e866a923e","name":{"en":"Historical"}},{"id":"36fd93ea-e8b8-445e-b836-358f02b3d33d","name":{"en":"Monsters"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"489dd859-9b61-4c37-af75-5b18e88daafc","name":{"en":"Ninja"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"81183756-1453-4c81-aa9e-f6e1b63be016","name":{"en":"Samurai"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"92d6d951-ca5e-429c-ac78-451071cbf064","name":{"en":"Office Among these foxes is the very special Caisheng, a little fox girl with the ability to change into a male fox demon when she matures and allow the continuation of her species. One day, she secretly went into a nearby human village and befriended a boy named Duoxi and a girl named Xiaoque, and when the little fox child is attacked by a dog, the two human children saved her! Now the two children are marked, and will remain so – even in their reincarnated lives – until Caisheng repays her debt to them…   \n  \nTwo hundred years later, Caisheng not only becomes the most powerful fox demon but also has mastered the art of gender transformation. She begins her search for her saviors' reincarnations: the boy now known as Yunshi, and the girl as Ping'er. Not knowing Caisheng's true identity, Yunshi falls in love with the female Caisheng, and Ping'er with the male Caisheng! But Yunshi is a priest whose duty is to destroy all of the demons… what will he do when he discovers Caisheng's true nature? And whom will Caisheng choose in the end?   \n  \n(Clarifying note: Very low smut content)"},"links":{"al":"31451","ap":"divine-melody","kt":"3093","mal":"1451","mu":"1285"},"originalLanguage":"zh","publicationDemographic":"shoujo","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"2bd2e8d0-f146-434a-9b51-fc9ff2c5fe6a","name":{"en":"Genderswap"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}}]}

The story starts off with Jikeina and Santa. Jikeina is Santa's older brother, and they made a living by getting rid of monsters or stopping monsters from invading a village. However, Santa has a mark on his left hand; it is the mark of the Akuma. Actually, it's the mark of \"Mahou's Power.\" There are 108 of the Akuma's powers, and they are passed down to \"successors.\" Each animal who has the blood of the Akuma is changed into a youkai, but only the most powerful of the lot are given one of the Akuma's powers, and they will have a mark on a part of their body as evidence that they inherited the power of the Akuma. 98e0a9a5-c373-410b-a763-1731c0afc9b7:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"98e0a9a5-c373-410b-a763-1731c0afc9b7","title":{"en":"My Girlfriend is My Stepmother"},"altTitles":[{"en":"My Stepmom Is My Girlfriend"},{"en":"New Mom Is Girlfriend"},{"ko":"새엄마는 내 여친"}],"lastChapter":"50","description":{"en":"When your dad brings home a significantly younger woman to introduce her as your new stepmother, it’s pretty normal to disapprove of the whole deal. 9903ec8f-ec6b-4920-8e89-8cdbf13987b0:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"9903ec8f-ec6b-4920-8e89-8cdbf13987b0","title":{"en":"Gaki Deka"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"がきデカ"},{"en":"Bratty Cop"}],"lastChapter":"323","relatedIdds":["1beb9f24-e9eb-4f22-9904-67bf5185b321"],"description":{"en":"(from amazon.jp):\n\nVolume 1: As part of the \"50th Anniversary of Tatsuhiko Yamagami's Manga Career\" we will be selling his masterpiece \"Gaki Deka\" as an e-book.\n\n\"Gaki Deka\" is a brilliant milestone in Japanese manga, and it is no exaggeration to say that gag manga that have continued to the present day began here.\n\nIt became a social phenomenon, and the popular phrase \"Death Penalty!\" by Komawari-kun became a buzzword. The total number of tankobon published (26 volumes) exceeded 30 million, and the magazine in which it appeared, \"Weekly Shonen Champion\" became the first in the Japanese manga world to sell 2 million copies, which is a testament to the popularity of the manga.\n\nFor this e-book version, we have decided to use the Akita Shoten version (first edition) and \"Gaki Deka THE BEST\" (3 volumes, Shogakukan Creative) as the base.\n\n\"Gaki Deka THE BEST\" is basically scanned directly from the original manuscripts, proofread by the magazines in which they were published (Weekly Shonen Champion, Monthly Shonen Champion, etc.), and proofread by the mangaka, so the works included in \"Gaki Deka THE BEST\" have been fully utilized. The other works are not included in the book.\n\nOther works are based on the Akita Shoten version of the first edition.\n\nHowever, as was the custom in the publishing world at the time, the Akita Shoten edition was not released in the order in which it was first published, but in the order in which it appeared in the magazine. In addition, there were several manuscripts in the second and later editions of the Akita Shoten edition that had been revised, perhaps to respond to complaints.\n\n\nThis is \"Gaki Deka\" which is said to be one of the achievements of postwar democracy, Shunsuke Tsurumi is said to have said.\n\nAs long as \"Gaki Deka\" is read by everyone, as long as people have the self-image of \"Oh, there are people like this in Japan\" or \"Japan is like this\" I think we are still safe. I feel that we still have one step to go to the point where we can create a posture for war by saying, \"Fight for justice\" or \"crusade\".\n\n(Shunsuke Tsurumi, \"From the History of Manga\") I think that \"Gaki Deka\" is a work that should be read \"now,\" perhaps in this sense as well,\nRegardless of this, please read and laugh at this work first."},"links":{"al":"152669","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/dp/B075TSNCK9?binding=kindle_edition\u0026ref=dbs_dp_rwt_sb_pc_tukn","ap":"gaki-deka","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-2353274","mal":"144826","mu":"jz4jpqf"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"799c202e-7daa-44eb-9cf7-8a3c0441531e","name":{"en":"Martial Arts"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"da2d50ca-3018-4cc0-ac7a-6b7d472a29ea","name":{"en":"Delinquents"}},{"id":"df33b754-73a3-4c54-80e6-1a74a8058539","name":{"en":"Police"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

Alors qu'elle renonce à la vie, elle se réincarne dans un monde maléfique. Elle devient l'unique héritière d'une famille de sorciers au sang-pur. Seulement, ce n'est pas tout, à peine réveillée de son coma qui a duré quatre ans, son père lui impose de passer l'examen pour devenir la femme du futur roi, et là, les ennuis commencent pour elle!\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/54517661), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/flower_of_prensia), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6856395)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* English: [ComiKey](https://comikey.com/comics/the-flower-of-prencia-webtoon/442/), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/1588), [Lalatoon](https://www.lalatoon.com/en/webtoon/episode/toon/5694), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/comics/flower-of-prencia), [WebComics](https://www.webcomicsapp.com/comic/The-Flower-of-Prencia/630dcad18c252b06c93968ed)\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_0000214)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.tappytoon.com/de/comics/flower-of-prencia-de)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Flower-of-Prencia/446)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/24635)\n* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/fantasy/flower-of-francia/list?title_no=3692)","ko":"마계 프렌시아의 순수 혈통 마녀로 되살아난 사빈.  \n그런데 얼굴도 이름도 모르는 마왕의 반려자가 되기 위한 시험을 치러야 한다고? Fujimoto.\n\nVolume 1: 17-21\n\n- Chapter 1. **There were Two Chickens in the Garden (Niwa ni wa Niwa Niwatori ga Ita, 庭には二羽ニワトリがいた。)**\nA strange world where aliens have taken over the human world, and only two humans are left which are apparently disguising themselves as mere chickens.\n\n- Chapter 2. **Sasaki-kun Has Stopped the Bullet (Sasaki-kun ga Judan Tometa, 佐々木くんが銃弾止めた)**\nTo Sasaki, his teacher Kawaguchi is God. She taught him not to be ashamed of his own dreams and made him feel fully capable to forge forward and make them come true, no matter how low the odds. Yet one day, trouble from Kawaguchi's past follows her into the classroom. With his god in danger of total humiliation, Sasaki sets out to protect his teacher using her very own teachings: to strive for the impossible.\n\n- Chapter 3. **Love is Blind (Koi wa Moumoku, 恋は盲目)**\nA one-shot story about a boy that is blind to everything but love. Can he confess to his crush?\n\n- Chapter 4. **Shikaku (シカク)**\nA notorious hit-man bites off more than they can chew when their newest target turns out to be holding a supernatural secret. Bullets fly and love is in the air.\n\nVolume 2: 22-26\n\n- Chapter 1. **Siren Rhapsody (Ningyo Rhapsody, 人魚ラプソディ)**\nIn a world where sirens are common, the protagonist is a hybrid of a human father and a mermaid mother. He's always playing the piano under the sea, when a strange siren approaches him…\n\n- Chapter 2. **\"When I Woke Up I had Become a Girl\" Disease (Me wo Sametara Onnanoko ni Natteita Byou, 目が覚めたら女の子になっていた病)**\nA boy wakes up to discover he has become a girl! How will this affect his daily life?!\n\n- Chapter 3. **Nayuta of the Prophecy (Yogen no Nayuta, 予言のナユタ)**\nA tale about a prophecy involving a girl with horns who is said to bring destruction upon the world, and her brother.\n\n- Chapter 4. **Little Sister's Elder Sister (Imouto no Ane, 妹の姉)**\nA story about sisters aspiring to be artists."},"links":{"al":"139855","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B09DK7YSHP","ap":"fujimoto-tatsuki-tanpenshuu-17-21","bw":"series/322921","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/658635/","engtl":"https://www.viz.com/read/manga/tatsuki-fujimoto-before-chainsaw-man/all","mal":"141214","mu":"190368"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"2bd2e8d0-f146-434a-9b51-fc9ff2c5fe6a","name":{"en":"Genderswap"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"b1e97889-25b4-4258-b28b-cd7f4d28ea9b","name":{"en":"Philosophical"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"e64f6742-c834-471d-8d72-dd51fc02b835","name":{"en":"Aliens"}},{"id":"eabc5b4c-6aff-42f3-b657-3e90cbd00b75","name":{"en":"Supernatural"}}]}

وتدعم صديقتها الموهوبة سيرينجيفان بدلاً من ذلك. \"احصل على تلك القطعة المجنونة!\" لكنه خانها وباعها على أنها عاهرة على الرغم من وعدهم بالزواج. في يأسها الذي لا مفر منه ، ظهر رجل بدا أنه نبيل أمام سيليستيا ورؤية حالته ، تقترح عليه سيليستيا صفقة. \"يمكنني أن أشفي المرض الذي تعاني منه.\" \"...أين سمعت عني؟\" كان وجه الرجل يخيف بشكل متزايد لكن سيليستيا أرادت أن تعيش. حصلت في النهاية على ما أرادت ، ووصلت إلى مكان يشبه القصر الإمبراطوري. \"في المستقبل ، اتصل بي\" صاحبة الجلالة \". \"... جلالة الملك؟\" \"بالطبع ، أنا الإمبراطور الوحيد لإمبراطورية بورغ ، فان.\" والمثير للدهشة أن هوية الرجل هي ... إمبراطور إمبراطورية بورغ ، المعروف باسم مختل عقليًا ذو عيون حمراء. أصبحت سلستيا واحدة من رعايا الإمبراطور. هل تستطيع النجاة بأمان؟\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** junge Frau wird von ihrem Ex-Verlobten als Sklavin verkauft. Gegen ihren Willen muss sie ihren kleinen kranken Bruder zurücklassen. Als sie die Hoffnung auf Rettung fast verloren hat, trifft sie auf einen jungen Adeligen, der etwas Besonderes in ihr sieht: Eine Person, die sein Leiden heilen kann und in deren Gegenwart er zur Ruhe kommt. Er nimmt sie mit sich in seinen Palast, damit sie für ihn arbeiten kann. Die Frau ist so dankbar, dass sie alles Erdenkliche tut, um die neue Sekretärin ihres Befreiers zu werden, welcher nicht nur irgendein Adeliger ist, sondern der König eines fremden Landes!\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/1217), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56466828), [KToon](https://v2.myktoon.com/mw/works/list.kt?worksseq=10792), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5990137), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2107076031)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-tyrants-secret-secretary/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30680)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%9C%B8%E7%8E%8B%E7%A5%95%E6%9B%B8%E7%9A%84%E7%8D%A8%E5%AE%B6%E7%99%82%E6%B3%95/250)\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000513)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.delitoon.de/detail/dad_2000138)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Why-the-Emperor-Need-a-Secretary/20)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66982)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%B2/273)","en":"Celestia lives in the back alley of Golddina and has a skill that can dispel magic. She thinks that her skill is useless and supports her talented friend Serengevan instead.\n\n\"Get that crazy b'tch out!\"\n\nBut he betrayed her and sold her as a slave even though they promised to get married. In her inescapable despair, a man who looked to be a nobleman appeared before Celestia and seeing his condition, Celestia proposes a deal to him.\n\n\"I can heal the disease you are suffering from.\"\n\n\"…Where did you hear about me?\"\n\nThe man's face was getting increasingly scary but Celestia wanted to live. She eventually got what she wanted, and arrived at a place which resembled the imperial palace.\n\n\"In the future, call him 'Your Majesty.'\"\n\n\"…Your Majesty?\"\n\n\"Of course, he's the one and only Emperor of the Burg Empire, Van.\"\n\nSurprisingly, the identity of the man is… The Emperor of the Burg Empire, known as the Red-Eyed Psychopath. Celestia became one of the emperor's subjects. Can she survive safely?\n\n---\nCelestia was in love and dreaming of a brighter tomorrow until, out of the blue, her fiancé cheated on her and left her for dead. Suddenly, she was alone with nothing. Enter the Emperor, cold and aloof with unlimited power and wealth. He was alone with everything. But now these two have each other. Her cunning and courage make her invaluable to him, and yet it’s the secret they share that makes them inseparable... and a target for those who crave power. Will their relationship remain professional, or will it become something magical?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/1217), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56466828), [KToon](https://v2.myktoon.com/mw/works/list.kt?worksseq=10792), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5990137), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2107076031)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-tyrants-secret-secretary/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30680)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%9C%B8%E7%8E%8B%E7%A5%95%E6%9B%B8%E7%9A%84%E7%8D%A8%E5%AE%B6%E7%99%82%E6%B3%95/250)\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000513)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.delitoon.de/detail/dad_2000138)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Why-the-Emperor-Need-a-Secretary/20)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66982)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%B2/273)","fr":"Vendue en esclavage par son ami d’enfance et ex-fiancé, une jeune femme laisse contre son gré son jeune frère souffrant. Tout semble perdu pour elle quand elle croise le chemin d’un jeune noble! Possédant une capacité de guérison hors norme dont il a tant besoin, elle arrive à négocier avec lui sa liberté. Ainsi, elle le suit jusque dans son palais et va tout faire pour devenir la secrétaire de celui qui pourrait bien être... l'empereur d’un pays étranger.\n\n---\nCelestia vivait dans les bas quartiers de Goldina, au milieu des rues étroites remplies de terre, où des mendiants y traînaient comme des cadavres.\n\nElle possède un talent rare qui permet de dissiper la magie et pense filer le parfait amour avec son ami d'enfance, Serek. Mais celui-ci la trahit et la vend en esclavage. En route vers le marché où elle sera vendu, elle rencontre un noble et passe un accord avec lui; «Je peux guérir la maladie dont vous souffrez.»\n\nTant bien que mal, elle réussit à se sauver, mais... «À l'avenir, appelle-moi 'Votre Majesté'.». L'identité de cet homme n'est autre que Van, l'Empereur de Burg. C'est donc ainsi que Celestia devient le sujet du psychopathe aux yeux rouges...\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/1217), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56466828), [KToon](https://v2.myktoon.com/mw/works/list.kt?worksseq=10792), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5990137), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2107076031)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-tyrants-secret-secretary/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30680)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%9C%B8%E7%8E%8B%E7%A5%95%E6%9B%B8%E7%9A%84%E7%8D%A8%E5%AE%B6%E7%99%82%E6%B3%95/250)\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000513)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.delitoon.de/detail/dad_2000138)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Why-the-Emperor-Need-a-Secretary/20)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66982)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%B2/273)","id":"Celestia yang tinggal di gang kecil Goldina, memiliki kemampuan untuk menghilangkan sihir. Dopo essere stata tradita da chi più amava, viene venduta come schiava. È proprio nel momento di maggior disperazione che incontra un uomo che sembra essere un nobile. Con lui stringe un accordo: lo guarirà dalla sua malattia in cambio del suo aiuto a riottenere la libertà. L'uomo accetta e la porta con sé al palazzo imperiale. \"In futuro, mi chiamerai sua Maestà.\" Sorprendentemente, quell'uomo è in realtà il re dell'Impero di Burg, conosciuto anche come \"lo psicopatico dagli occhi rossi\"... Riuscirà Celestia a sopravvivere?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/1217), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56466828), [KToon](https://v2.myktoon.com/mw/works/list.kt?worksseq=10792), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5990137), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2107076031)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-tyrants-secret-secretary/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30680)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E9%9C%B8%E7%8E%8B%E7%A5%95%E6%9B%B8%E7%9A%84%E7%8D%A8%E5%AE%B6%E7%99%82%E6%B3%95/250)\n* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/detail/daf_1000513)\n* [German / Deutsch](https://www.delitoon.de/detail/dad_2000138)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Why-the-Emperor-Need-a-Secretary/20)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66982)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%B2/273)","ru":"Селестия живёт на заднем дворе Голддины и имеет способность, отменяющюю магию. Она считает свою способность бесполезной и своего талантливого друга Серенгебана. \"Избавьтесь от этой поехавшей!\" Но он предал её и продал в рабство, несмотря на обещание брака. Внезапно перед ней появился благородно выглядящий мужчина, и, увидев его состояние, Селестия предложила ему сделку. \"Я могу излечить то, от чего Вы так страдаете\". \"Откуда тебе об этом известно?\" Лицо мужчины становилось всё злее, но Селестия хотела жить. В итоге она добивается своего и оказывается во дворце, похожим на имперский дворец. \"В дальнейшем обращайся ко мне \"Ваше Величество\". \"……Ваше Величество?\" \"Разумеется. Я - единственный Император Бургской Империи, Ван!\" Оказалось, что этот человек… Правитель Бургской Империи, известный, как Красноглазый Психопат! Селестия стала одной из его подданных, Сможет ли она теперь выжить?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/1217), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56466828), Golddina’nın arka sokağında yaşıyordu ve büyüyü defedebilen bir yeteneğe sahipti.Yeteneğinin işe yaramaz olduğunu düşünür ve onun yerine yetenekli arkadaşı Serengevan’ı desteklerdi.“Şu deli orospuyu dışarı çıkartın!”Ama o ona ihanet etti ve evlenme sözü vermelerine rağmen onu köle olarak sattı.Onun kaçınılmaz çaresizliğinde, asilzade olan bir adam Celestia ve onun durumunu görmeden ortaya çıktı, Celestia onunla bir anlaşma yapmayı teklif etti.“Acı çektiğin hastalığı iyileştirebilirim.”“…Beni nereden duydun?” Adamın yüzü giderek korkunçlaşıyordu ama Celestia yaşamak istiyordu.Sonuç olarak istediğini aldı, ve imparatorluk sarayını andıran bir yere vardı.“Gelecekte, bana ‘Majesteleri’ diye seslen.”“…Majesteleri?”“Elbette, ben Burg İmparatorluğu’nun ilk ve tek imparatoru, Van.”Şaşırtıcı bir şekilde, adamın kimliği…Burg İmparatorluğu’nun imparatoru, Kırmızı-Gözlü Psikopat olarak da bilinir.Celestia, imparatorun tebaalarından biri oldu.Güvenli bir şekilde hayatta kalabilecek mi?Kralın sekretere ihtiyaç duymasının nedeni…\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Comico](https://www.comico.kr/comic/1217), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56466828), A runaway brought up as the adopted heir and sex toy of \"Papa\" Dino Golzine, Ash, now at the rebellious age of seventeen, forsakes the kingdom held out by the devil who raised him. But the hideous secret that drove Ash's older brother mad in Vietnam has suddenly fallen into Papa's insatiably ambitious hands—and it's exactly the wrong time for Eiji Okamura, a pure-hearted young photographer from Japan, to make Ash Lynx's acquaintance…  \n\n[Official English](https://www.viz.com/banana-fish)\n  \n---\nLink:  \n[ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20197) (anime)","pt-br":"A natureza fez Ash Lynx um cara bonito; mas o tempo fez dele um assassino cruel e frívolo. Uma criança fugitiva criada como um herdeiro adotado, um guerreiro treinado, e o brinquedo sexual de seu “Papa”, Dino Golzine, o senhor do crime da Costa do Oeste Oriental. Ash está agora na idade rebelde dos dezessete anos – abandonando o reino de poder e riqueza, realizada pelo demônio que o ressuscitou, preferindo um código para viver entre um pequeno, mas fiel, gangue de bandidos de rua. Porém, “Papa” não pode simplesmente deixá-lo ir. Não quando descobre que o segredo que levou o irmão mais velho de Ash a loucura, no Vietnã, poderá cair em suas mãos insaciavelmente ambiciosas. É exatamente o momento errado para Eiji Okamura, um jovem fotógrafo do Japão, de coração puro, chegar em Nova York e travar conhecimento de Ash Lynx… e ao seu lado, ser atraído para dentro de um redemoinho sangrento de orgulho, ganância, luxúria e ira desencadeada pelo enigma de codinome Banana Fish.","tr":"Tanrı, Ash Lynx’i güzeller güzeli bir çocuk olarak yarattı; dünya onu soğukkanlı acımasız bir katil haline getirdi. Çocuk yaşta evden kaçan Ash, “Baba” Dino Golzine tarafından bulunur ve hem mafyanın varisi olarak hem de Golzine’nin şahsi zevklerini tatmin etmek üzere yetiştirilir. Şimdi 17 yaşında isyankar bir genç olan Ash kendisini yetiştiren şeytanın ona sunduğu krallığa sırtını döner. Ancak Ash’in ağabeyinin Vietnam’da aklını yitirmesine sebep olan korkunç sır, hırsı dur durak bilmeyen Golzine’nin ellerine düşmüştür. İşte tam bu sırada genç bir fotoğrafçı Japonya’dan New York’a gelir.
